p: To obtain the mosquito suspension, a solution of 1 mL of Dulbeccoâ€™s phosphate buffered saline diluent 1X (D-PBS) (Life technologies, Carlsbad, CA, USA) with 2% penicillin and streptomycin, 1% fungizone, and 5% fetal bovine serum was added to each mosquito pool and then macerated on TissueLyser II equipment (Qiagen, Hilden, Alemanha) at 25 Hz for 1 min using a 3 mm diameter tungsten sphere based on an adapted protocol [ 47].
